content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke and, as usual, looked up at the sky.  it was a round 9:15 pm and i observed a starlike object moving from west to east. it was about as high as an airplane would be that is ascending from kci, so it wasn't at such a high altitude that it could be considered a satellite.  it was most definitely lower than that.  i quickly called my mother outside and pointed the object out to her.  there were no discernible flashing lights, and normally, no matter the altitude, we would have been able to hear the engine if it were an airplane, but there was absolutely no noise.  it wasn't a completely straight path.  it seemed to be wobbling around a little bit.  just before it was about to be out of our line of sight, it dimmed out and disappeared.  we saw why - an airplane was in close proximity, coming from the southeast heading northwest, and a minute later crossed the path of where the starlike object would have been.  this is the second time this week i have seen this.  i saw the exact same kind of object fly in a similar direction on monday this week at approximately the same time. i felt a little elated because just before i saw the object on monday i had thought to myself that i needed a clearer sign of what these starlike objects were that i have been seeing and wanted to be positive that my eyes weren't playing tricks on me.  to me, i don't think it could have been any clearer.
content.summary: Flew over the area we live, then dimmed out as a plane was approaching

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into my drive way, i had never seen anything like it before and have been around aircraft all my life.When i first noticed it i thought it was a star but then i quckly noticed it was moving very fast moving from northeast toward the west it then stoped dead and hovered for about 5 min. it was kind of domed shaped on top but flat on the bottom there was no soun and the color it seemed to be glowing it was bluish green very bright in color. after the sighting sighting i almost couldnt believe what i had seen, told my family what i had seen right after the sighting i was vey excited. it went back toward the north east very fast it was out of my sight within a half of a second if i would have blinked i would have missed its leaving
content.summary: I watched a bright grenish blue object flying fron the northeast moving west i then witnessed it hovering maybe a mile and a half from me after watching it for about 5 min it left the area backnortheast if i would have blinked i would have missed it.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Well, here i go. i joined the u.S.A.F in 1979, while in basic training myself and another airman were selected for a little project. i could write more details about it, but i would rather not discuses them on an open line. it has been 10 years since i have been free to talk but i have kept my head down for personal reasons. in the past 10 years i have tried numerous times to contact anyone in organizations such as this who might listen, but so far, out of over 200 emails and hand written letters i have had no success. to continue; after i arrived at the base i had been assigned to i was met at the airport by two gentlemen in suites who drove me the base. i was put up in the tdy barracks for what they told me was going to be an overnight stay and there would be a sargent come to pick me up in the mourning. i arrived on a monday night at around 2330, the next mourning the alarm clock went off at 0500, i had not set it. it was wednesday. again, i would love to go into detail but not on an open line. here is where the fun started, i went to work for the osi. i only hope i don't end up like bill, if i am contacted the person will hopefully have the proper credentials. one of the reasons i have not spoken loader on this is painfully obvious, every time i have attempted to send an email or hand written letter, i get a reply alright, just not the kind i want. i have had my home broken into, friends hurt (an worse) so i am pretty leery, jumpy you might even say. so i hope i hear something, i need to get this off my chest, it's been to long and ptsd is no fun when the veterans hospital doctors say that there is nothing wrong with me. i will say, i have a lot to talk about, that floats, fly's, jumps, disappears and skips.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: All kinds, please read my discription.

content.detailedDescription:
I was vacationing with a friend last year on the east and west side of michigan around lake lelanau and suttons bay...Took lots of photos with a hand-held, pocket-style, panasonic hd "point-and-shoot" collapsible lens...And proceeded to "color enhance" my photos using photoshop.
 
as i was also adjusting the "brightness level"...I noticed something bizarre off in the distance of the lake...And cannot explain just what appears to be either "coming out of"...Or "plunging into" the water.
 
i am stymied...Due to the fact that i didn't see anything with the naked eye when i shot this...As well as the fact that there is something rather "rectangular" just out in front of the object...Yet hollow in nature.
 
given mufon���s experience at deducing "truly unidentifiable, ergo, a ufo/uso" versus "this can be explained" phenomena ... can anyone shed some light as to what this might be?
 
i took numerous other photos with some birds flying...And quite frankly, given the great distance that this one photo in which the object appears to be from shore...Plus the fact that it is not a "plunging pelican", a ���crane������.Nor clearly is it any bird ... i am at a loss to explain.
 
there were no local light-weight planes around, no one sky-diving into the waters, no large sailboats cruising��� only occasional motor boats, and, in short, nothing out of the ordinary that one could either reasonably "hear" ...Or "see" with the naked eye.  

the only phenomena the proceeding day were very, very thick clouds and fog that didn't lift until late in the day.. and it was a very humid day.  

august 29, 2013 (the day this photo was taken) was mostly ���unremarkable��� from a weather stand-point ���and/or incident standpoint.  i saw nothing with the naked eye during the week i was driving with a friend in michigan when visiting.  

nobody saw anything out of the ordinary; i only discovered the ���object��� in the picture... in december���when i zoomed in with my computer��� to ���color correct��� and/or ���lighten/darken���  my photos before burning them on a cd ���and only one photo (of hundreds) had any unusual object that is not identifiable.   
 
i have no rational explanation that would preclude a uso.   i am a former tool designer as well as an artist...And my forte is "details"...To a tolerance of "plus or minus" .005 inches!
 
i would appreciate finding out if anyone in michigan has seen anything like this���either with their eyes as it happened���or���on a photo viewed after-the-fact (similar to my photo and to the phenomenon in britain where the little gal on the hill had some ���alien figure��� behind her on one of three exposures ���but not the other two when the ���film��� was developed).  
 
i have included the "original" digital snapshot...As well as two more "color enhanced jpeg's with arrows" that were photoshop'd...Noting the very darkest one still doesn't give me a clue...But does give you a clue that the photo has not been "shopped".
 
thank you for your consideration.
content.summary: Took photo (later discovered on photo) of object either diving into or flying up out of lake in michigan on august 29, 2013

content.detailedDescription:
Bristol, tennessee
 one night subject went in back yard and looked up. the sky was clear no clouds. 
subject saw this brilliant ball of white light coming over the mountains behind subjects house.   it approached subjects house and hovered for seconds  no sound no vapor trail.  subject called son and we saw it moving away towards the east over volunteer parkway.  while over volunteer parkway the bright ball turned a dark red and then formed into an elongated oval with points at end still in red. then it became a red ball again in an instant. then the red ball turned into a red ring and disappeared.

six months later while walking dogs at pm, subject saw a boomerang shaped object coming towards him at about 1,000 feet.
boomerang had no lights and looked to be colored battleship gray
it flew east, had no sound and no vapor trail, it was close.

subject was a combat air traffic controller in the air force and knew this 
was not a plane.

since that incident subject has seen several balls of while light that don't seem high in the atmosphere and vanish.

three years ago, in the morning, subject saw a bell shaped object over the mountains.  it was hovering ans slowing moving toward the west.
subject called son and both witnessed it for ten minutes before subject had to go to work.  the next morning the bell was in the same spot, same slow movement towards the west. subject watched bell until he had to leave.

reunion at lynnbrook, long island, new york.  labor day in 2008
saw a brilliant ball of white light hovering in the sky 
eight people also witnessed the ball of light
it then shot down a light in three phases, the light traveled at a constant speed.  three phases of light.  then in an instant it turned back into the big ball, turned into a ring and vanished.  when it did a wisp of humidity went through the spot where the ring was.
while subjects were discussing ufo they saw a passenger jet from jfk with a ball of light next to it, it stalked the passenger jet for at least 15 seconds and then turned off.

the last object i saw was november 2013 in the evening, subject observed ball of white light for 2 to 3 minutes.  it was at 2,000 feet. it simply blinked out.
content.summary: In 2007 subject observed white ball of light cmming over the mountains

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On the night/early morning of dec.28,2000...I was working a night shift with another employee,i was feeding an incinerator pit with the green waste from a 900 acre golf course we were in the process of building.As the lead equipment operator on night shift....I was responsible for production and feeding the incinerator pit.
i first saw this enormous disk shaped object i visually estimated by using the  i-10 interstate in the foreground,at a mile and a half wide.I watched this mouth wide open...Torn between going and getting my fellow employee,sal...And not wanting to miss a moment...After about 15 minutes,it moved and ascended up into the clouds...The lights on the outer edges were red,violet,pink,purple and some light source i couldn't tell where was coming from....About 10 minutes later..It came back and was hovering directly over the silver bell gold mine,south east of marana arizona. ..I jumped down off of the trackhoe i was operating and went to sal,who was in his jeep ccherokee this guy sal, who was an ex- green beret from vietnam,freaked out....Because i got up on the trackhoe and turned on all of the lights and started honking and waving my arms....He was screaming and pleading hysterically for me to stop...We watched it a good hour hovering above the gold mine....Sal was in his jeep,never did come outside of it again at night and quit a short while later...You could see its illuminations lighting up the cloud base that was above it...I know what i had a straight line of site from the 3
elevated position i had...I wish i would have had a cell phone or a camera with a telephoto lens.
content.summary: The disk we saw was hovering over a goldmine

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday april 12th 2014,in shepherd tx, i was driving my kids home from baseball practice. just as i was turning into my neighborhood i noticed a kind of silver object in the sky, it was bright and kind of round in shape.. i thought at first that maybe it was the sun reflecting off of an airplane. i stopped on the side of the road of my neighborhood to get a better look because it just looked odd. i noticed that what ever the object was, was not moving. it was just staying in the same spot. i was watching dumbfounded for about 10 seconds and then it just disappeared. i have never seen anything like this before, i know it was not a plane. i was never much of a believer of ufo's, but i can't explain what i saw, but now i will take a little more time to look upward.
content.summary: Bright object in the sky, stayed still for about 30 seconds and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My grandmother, mother and i were driving away from the herr's potato chip factory, i don't remember the roads name, in nottingham pa when we observed the ufo. 

i first noticed the object when gazing out the passenger side back seat window of the car. i was bored and only had the scenery to look at when i saw a silver shiny object high in the sky.  i thought it was a plane at a high altitude until it moved impossibly fast.  i could no longer view it from that window and had to lean forward to view it through the front window.  that is when i alerted my mother and grandmother and pointed it out. all three of us watched as the object moved incredibly fast among the clouds. it was oval shaped, silver and very reflective. it reflected the sunlight. it could stop on a dime and change direction. it descended, ascended and moved on a diagonal path. it made no sound or it was too high in the sky for us to hear it.

we watched the object for several minutes before it took off into the distance at an incredible speed.  we all just looked at each other. it was a surreal experience but short. we concluded that it wasn't a plane or a helicopter and since it flew off there was nothing we could do about it.  it was pretty much like "wow! a ufo! so, what's for lunch?" kind of conversation. i think we were overwhelmed and powerless so we just moved on quickly. like i said, there was nothing we could do about it. we did not see that object or anything else abnormal again that day nor since. 

my grandmother has passed, i spoke with my mother before writing this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We observered a metallic object high in the sky that  was moving too quickly to be a plane, could stop and change direction suddenly.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On 4/16/2014 @ 12:45 pm i saw a rainbow around the sun i was call by they attention of my wife and co-worker to witness tbis phenomenon. it was a first as i continued to look at the sun with my sunglasses didnt see anything at first until i look at my pictures and so the mysterious orb or object
content.summary: Makes me a beliver

content.detailedDescription: I was taking piks of the moon during an eclipse. in two of the photos, the moon was blurry.  only later did i realize,  it was because my camera was focusing on something else. a few minutes before i took these piks, i also witnessed a shooting star headed from s to n. i was facing s just before midnight observing the red moon.
content.summary: Strange object photographed accidentally over las vegas during red moon eclipse.

content.detailedDescription:
Subject was driving on a highway outside orlando florida,when he first saw a cigar shaped ufo in sky as far up as a commercial airliner  he pulled over and watched it go by 
it caught his eye because it was shining very brightly like the sun  yellow and orange  he could see no separate lights on it it was so bright

the next day subject saw two more cigar shaped ufos
 they were at the altitude that a cessna airplane would fly  
one cigar shaped ufo was hovering over a field and the other was hovering in clouds and peeking out every so often
subject looked away for a second and both had disappeared
subject said he used to live in las vegas and saw a lot of planes and what he saw was not a plane
he was very excited and happy to see the ufos
subject will be moving to kansas soon
content.summary: While driving near orlando florida saw cigar shaped ufo in shy to the east

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at about 3 am alone to see a meteor shower that was occur on 4/23/14. i was on my back porch and the sky was clear, but i couldn't find one shooting star after several minutes. then i noticed an object high in the sky at the 1 o'clock position. it appeared triangular-shaped with green lights and a red light in the center. it was not big since it seemed far away. it looked strange and stationary, and next to it there was a brighter, white object that seems almost like a star, but it was too big and bright to be a star or planet. it fascinated me and keep saying omg to myself because i knew i was witnessing a ufo. at one point the objects just disappeared for a few seconds like the lights were turned off. that portion of the sky was clear, so it wasn't clouds covering my view. and then i saw the objects re-appear in the same position. i went inside to get my camera, but it didn't have batteries, so i came back outside and watched some more. all together i probably observed the objects for 20 minutes or more. they were still in the sky when i finally quit watching.
content.summary: noticed an object high in the sky at the 1 o'clock position. it was appeared triangular-shaped with green lights and a red light in the center. not big because it was far away. it was stationary, next to brighter object.

content.detailedDescription: On the morning of march 26, 2014, i was reviewing the captured events on my home security camera. the camera is designed to record video upon motion detection. one video from 01:30 that morning showed an odd light on the porch. at first i thought someone was playing with a flashlight, since i saw a companion light to the right of the main object, but the way the light behaved was inconsistent with that. the light appeared to pulsate, and it changed shape. there were also appendages that extended from the light. i showed this video to several people, but none of us could explain what it was.
content.summary: Pulsating shape-changing light

content.detailedDescription:
the two objects appeared while my wife and i were outside watching for meteors from the lyrids meteor shower on monday night. we were feeling mildly bored as this was not the peak hour to watch, but we were had to get to bed soon. 
     the objects moved very rapidly across the sky from west to east in the span of less than 20 seconds. they were just south of the big dipper, which was to our left in our field of view. they appeared into view almost straight up and continued until going out of sight behind the trees. 
     the objects were both almost exactly identical. i can remember them looking roughly like upside-down triangles(flat side leading with point as tail) with blue glow, but my wife insists she saw them as more pentagon shaped with orange-ish overall glow. they stayed very close with one following the other, but the one following had to make a small correction to keep in formation. they made no sound. 
     we both had time to question each other what we were seeing and noticed that if they were planes at that altitude, they surely would have been making some kind of sound, as we are accustomed to planes overhead due to the airport just outside town. we only felt mildly stunned and excited at witnessing something unexplainable, and the objects showed no obvious interest in us.
     if these things were the size of known aircraft, they could not have been very high in the air and should have made some kind of sound. they moved much more quickly than any aircraft we know of as they covered the entire half of sky in less than 15 seconds.
content.summary: Two pentagon-shaped objects moved very quickly across the sky moving west to east

content.detailedDescription: I was walking saw my lights in the for 30mins then then a hummiound human with black eyes i ran and they follow have half to house thten ship dissapper
content.summary: Black eyed child after ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was driving through the desert and witnessed a bright star like object moving southeast across the sky. the object then split into two and suddenly both objects changed direction, the more prominently lit object continued eastbound across the sky.  both objects eventually came back together and flew out of sight.  the whole incident lasted about 2 minutes. i was completely surprised and i've never seen anything like that since.
content.summary: Fast moving object split into two and abruptly changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was in pico rivera  california  i was going to get something  to eat . i was going down the street when i seen about 10 are more lights in the sky the objects were flashing red all together and in about 10 to 15 minutes the objects went different ways and the objects were gone as i was leaving .
content.summary: Red lights flashing in the sky about 20 or more all together

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 04/21/14 @ approximately 2130 hrs; my girlfriend and i noticed a very bright and colorful object in the eastern sky.  so we, loaded up my tripod and video camera and went to the college campus in bemidji, mn to observe and film said object.  while taking photos and some video; we noticed a smaller object very high in the sky, that appeared to be solid white; moving from ssw and moving at a steady fast clip heading due north. 

i had my video camera on the tripod, and tried to follow it as best i could, as it moved across the sky...This was at approx 2200 hrs.  while observing this object, we'd noticed another similar object moving from w to ne; however, i kept the video camera on this object.  after we'd filmed it for around 1 minute; we'd also noticed a smaller, bluish colored object appear;  which had flashing lights, and seemed to be even higher than the object in question, appear out of nowhere, and seemed to be staying with object in question. 

i continued to track the object i'd referenced, and caught the flashing object in the video as well...But within seconds after the second object came into view, the brighter orb-type object completely disappeared in mid flight.
content.summary: Girlfriend and myself went to college campus to view a very bright object(pos mars?) in the eastern skies above bemidji, and shortly after, spotted this, along with 2 other orb-type objects moving steadily across the sky while filming (mars?).

content.detailedDescription: My 2 sons and i were riding 4 wheelers on top of the ridge taking a break about dusk when my youngest son said what was that ? looking up at the sky , thats when we seen the ufo and was amazed at the color and movement of it ,of course we wasn't sure what it was at first until after watching it until it flew out of site , it appeared to move slow and fast , and it burst into colors like it exploded , but it had lights on it at all times , it appeared to move from side to side but not a great deal just enough to notice , we could not believe what we were seeing , we were kinda scared and in shock , we knew after watching this it was not a balloon or any man made craft , it had no sound at all and was low enough to hear it if so , i was lucky enough to have my camera with me as we were taking some pictures of trees that had been timbered , sad thing was i was shaking too bad to get more pictures , it also had very many colors that came from it
content.summary: Ufo was bright , silent , beautiful , quick moving , we were on top of ridge riding 4 wheelers when seen about dusk , my son noticed it and said what was that ?

content.detailedDescription: I was on the internet reading from the galactic federation of light website, and a being named commander ashter told me that there are starships over every major city around the world cloked. to prove it to me, he told me that there was a space ship outside my window. he said he would declock for me to see as prof. he told me to look out side up in the sky and he would flash red and blue lights at me because they were so happy to see me.  i opened my front door and looked up at the night sky and saw the ship flash its lights at me. i waved and said high. he said they are there to protect us and can't wait till they can fully disclose themselves to the planted earth. he told me that our galactic ancestors are waiting to reunite with the people of earth.
content.summary: I was contacted over the internet by a being called commander ashtar, he told me that they were going to declock to show me they were really out side my door. they told me to go out side and look up at the stars and they will flash a hello sign to me.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in jaquzzi. 9pm  clear nite. saw plane go by high in sky. behind plane a brite flash then dimmed out. a few seconds later in nw sky same thing. a few seconds later in north sky same thing. a few seconds later helicopter went to same northern direction as last flash
content.summary: Brite white flash in the west. couple secs later another flash  nw. seconds later brite flash in the north

content.detailedDescription: Two lights traveling in circluar path one disapered after 10 seconds, other stoped and dimmed possible objects shot toward the ground. sighting lasted 20 minutes light still in sky when left observation.
content.summary: Two lights traveling in circluar path one disapered, other stoped amd dimmed possible objects shot toward the ground

content.detailedDescription: It was 10:05 pm april 22,2014 i was fixing to take off to bed but i had decided to let the dog use the bathroom one last time,so i walked out with my dog to the back porch and then i looked into the sky and i saw it.I thought it was a star at first but then it moved,i figured it was a shooting star so i payed no attention,i looked down and watched my dog,then around 30 seconds later i looked back in the sky and i saw about 30 more flying and moving across the sky,they were like bright white and blue lights zooming past,it was crazy,scared i got my grandparents who were in the house to come out and look,they followed to see what was the matter and when they got out there the 30 light ufo's were completely still and didn't move a bit.I was very confused and a little frightened at the same time.I went back in the house and called the dog back inside.At 10:18 i went back out and there they were except even more ufos about 45 of them were zooming in the sky.It was quite terrifying!
content.summary: It was very bright,i thought it was a star a first,then it moved and stared seeing more around me.

content.detailedDescription:
Although i was 9 or 10 years old at the time, it is the only unexplainable life event of my childhood that still causes me to question if what i saw was real or a figment of my imagination. but i was with a neighborhood friend we were just walking in the road in front of the home i lived in located in a developing sub-division. looking up has always fascinated me and still does so. what i saw was about 500 ft. overhead, not a sound. what caught my eye was the colors going in a circle from red to blue to yellow, i can not be sure if a white light was in the colors or not. it moved very very slowly in a straight direction.

there is another oddity i saw in the late night skies while living in mackville ky during the time that pres. bush shut down all air traffic due t0 the 911 attacks. first you need to understand that the skies above me was a jetline highway heading to either the louisville intl. airport or the lexington airport. there wasn't a night that there wasn't a line of jets overhead. this particular night i was taking a leak off the front pourch a saw a trio of lights in a triangle pattern moving slowly in the distance. what i didn't observe was any blinking or flashing lights that is assoiated with aircraft. suddenly the foremost point of light moved ahead of the other two lights about approx. 200 or so feet or 5-10 secs. then either it had slowed or the other two sped up to reaquire the triangle formation i first saw. now you can take this with a grain of salt, makes no different to me one way or the other. might help to know that i an also a 100% disabled peace time vet.

this is my story and it won't changer under any circumstance and i would be willing to go under hypnosis, take a poloygraph test or any test you can dream up.
content.summary: Dis-concerning

content.detailedDescription: Tuesday evening at 8:15 p.M. my neighbor and his father were out in front of their house. i went outside to talk to him. he and his father had just seen 3 objects flying over. he said "look a ufo" we looked to the north west and saw 2 red-orange lights in the sky coming over the tree line. behind the two lights was a large black triangle with no light. as they went over head with no sound what so ever, you could see that the red-orange light was in the center of the two other large black triangles. as we watched, the middle object with the red-orange light slowly went out. we watched the three objects slowly fly to the south east in a row until they were out of site. my neighbor ran home to get his phone so he could take a video just incase another one flew over. at that time i yelled to my husband to come outside. a couple of minutes later all three of us saw two more black triangles with red-orange lights flying in the same direction, again with no sound what so ever. my friend took a video of the last one coming over the tree line. about that same time we saw an airplane to the south of us flying in an easterly direction. you can hear the airplane in the background of his video. we saw no more after that.
content.summary: Witnessed 8 or 9 large black triangles, some with red-orange light in middle flying over my house. none were making any sound. they were moving very slowly

content.detailedDescription: This is the second video for case $55600
content.summary: Moving star

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my dogs and was looking at the stars, i heard an airplane and looked towards the east, where they normally fly when on approach to cincinnati international airport. after seeing that i noticed a bright light moving ne to se. no strobes, nothing, just a bright white light. it traveled overhead of my house, as it did, it seemed to slow down a bit, speed up, slow, speed up, slow and continue on it's path, about 1000 feet up and no sound what so ever. i observed this for about. 3 min and then i lost it in the trees and i couldn't see it anymore.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in san carlos when a strange light was observed. it hovered in one spot. then it flew slow and stopped.  it went down in a diagnal and stopped disappeared and popped up in another area then zipped off. i took pictures with my cellphone. i went home to blow up pics on cpu and i was amazed at what i saw. i was hesitant to report it. can anyone tell me what it is.
content.summary: I was driving in san carlos when a strange light was observed. it hovered in one spot. then it flew slow and stopped.  it went down in a diagnal and stopped disappeared and popped up in another area then zipped off. i took pictures with my cellphone.

content.detailedDescription:
The event i witnessed happened when i was about 5 years old. i shared a bed with my sister who also witnessed the same thing. it was 1988 and i lived in a small town in cape town south africa. i don't recall the time but it mustve been between 2 and 3 in the morning a week night. i remember being awake but not waking up and my room was filled with the brightest light i'd seen.  i looked a? my sister who was also awake. and together we peaked through the curtains at the light that was coming from our yard.   what i saw was not shocking but more mysterious. it was 4 or 5" people" in white glowing suits with what looked like a helmet and a visor i couldn't see their faces.They were about 4 to 5 feet tall.  they had what i can only describe as metal detectors and were moving side to side. the four beings that i saw where standing in a row and doing this side to side swaying motion.  there was a glowing and a bluish light coming from the end of the detector. then a voice speaks to me in my mind.Telepathically  it says " its ok . we are not here to hurt you . you can go back to sleep" . i will never forget that as long as i live. i felt pure peace and saftey. my sister looked at me i looked at her and we went to sleep. for years i thought this was dream until i was about 16 when i told my sister about this dream . she freaked out. she remembers seeing at least 10 of these beings not only in our yard but in the whole neighborhood.  she did not hear the voice but remembers feeling really calm and peaceful. 

that's my story. it plagues my mind cause i know there is intelligent life beyond earth.
content.summary: Saw 4 to 5 beings in back yard

content.detailedDescription: I was at home texting a friend.They were having bad weather and i had sunny skies, so i was going to take a picture of the sun and send it to her.I went outside and pointed my phone straight at the sun and took a snap shot.It was too bright to look up.When i looked at the picture there it was...Ive also seen 2 different redish orange orbs within the same 5mile radius
content.summary: I went outside to take pic of sun as a joke and it appeared on my pic
